readme:
## 🔁 Workflow Overview

  1. **Lead submits form** (via GoHighLevel)
  2. **Webhook triggers n8n**
  3. **Lead info is parsed**
  4. **Email & SMS are sent instantly**
  5. **Wait 24h → Email & SMS follow-up**
  6. **Wait 48h → Check engagement (clicked email?)**
  7. ✅ If interested → tag lead
  8. ❌ If cold → send re-engagement email
  9. 🎯 Done. You’ve built a smarter funnel.



* * *

## 🛠 Tech Stack

  * 🧱 [GoHighLevel](https://www.gohighlevel.com/) – for funnel, CRM & email
  * ⚙️ [n8n](https://n8n.io) – for no-code backend automation
  * ✉️ Gmail API – for personalized emails
  * 📲 Twilio – for SMS follow-up & confirmations



* * *

## ⚙️ How to Use

  1. **Import** the `.json` workflow into your n8n instance
  2. **Update** the Webhook node and paste the generated URL into your GHL form (trigger: “Form Submitted”)
  3. **Connect** your Gmail and Twilio credentials
  4. **Customize** the email and SMS content (texts, delays, CTAs)
  5. (Optional) **Map** outputs to Slack/Airtable for better team visibility



##### Pro Tip: Works great with quiz funnels, lead magnets, or local business forms.

* * *

## 📸 Screenshots

### 📥 Webhook Input & Lead Data Extract

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/Automated-Lead-Nurturing-Conversion-Funnel-using-GoHighLevel-n8n/main/ExtractLeadData.png)

### 🧲 Sample Funnel Page (Customizable Design)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/Automated-Lead-Nurturing-Conversion-Funnel-using-GoHighLevel-n8n/main/LeadCaptureFitnessPage.png)

### ⚡ GHL → Webhook → n8n Integration

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/Automated-Lead-Nurturing-Conversion-Funnel-using-GoHighLevel-n8n/main/WebhookAutomationPreview.png)

* * *

## 📽️ Live Demo

🎥 Watch the full automation in action:  
➡️ [Click to watch the full video on Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/1072318821/73ec9a8d47?share=copy)

* * *

### 🔄 Components You Can Customize:

Component | How to Customize  
---|---  
**Landing Page** | Replace content, branding, colors, and CTA  
**Form Fields** | Add/remove questions (e.g. budget, service type, location)  
**Webhook Destination** | Connect to any tool that supports webhooks (e.g. Zapier, Make, n8n)  
**Message Content** | Edit emails/SMS to match your voice & offer  
**Delays & Logic** | Adjust follow-up timing, re-engagement rules, triggers  
**Lead Filters** | Use tags, answers or behavior to qualify leads  
  
* * *

## 🎯 Ideal For

This automation is perfect for:

  * 💪 Fitness Coaches & Personal Trainers
  * 🧖‍♀️ Beauty Salons & Barbershops
  * 🛠️ Local Service Providers (electricians, plumbers, mechanics, etc.)
  * 🧼 Cleaning & Home Services
  * 💼 Freelancers & Consultants
  * 🧘‍♂️ Wellness Experts & Therapists
  * 🛍️ Small Shops & Product Sellers looking to capture leads via funnel forms

readme_zh:
## 🔁 工作流程概览

  1. **潜在客户提交表单**（通过GoHighLevel）
  2. **Webhook触发n8n**
  3. **解析潜在客户信息**
  4. **即时发送邮件和短信**
  5. **等待24小时→发送跟进邮件和短信**
  6. **等待48小时→检查互动情况（是否点击邮件？）**
  7. ✅ 若有意向→标记潜在客户
  8. ❌ 若冷淡→发送重新激活邮件
  9. 🎯 完成。您已构建了一个更智能的漏斗。
